content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I'm open to discussing the rental price with you, but please keep in mind that I have certain expectations and requirements that need to be met in order for me to agree to a price. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1200 Euros per month.

I understand that you have certain expectations and requirements that need to be met. Can you provide me with more details about those?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Certainly, Hassan. I would like to clarify that my apartment is located in a prime area of New York City, and it offers a lot of amenities and features that would make it an attractive place to live. As such, I am expecting a rental price that reflects the value and quality of the apartment.

In addition, I would like to remind you that my apartment is relatively small, with only 25 square meters of living space. However, I believe that the location and the amenities more than compensate for the size.

With that in mind, I would like to propose a rental price of 1300 Euros per month. This price takes into account the value of the apartment, as well as the various expenses and taxes that I would be responsible for as a landlord.

I hope this proposal is acceptable to you, Hassan. If not, please let me know and we can continue to discuss the rental price further.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1300 Euros per month.

I understand that the apartment is located in a prime area of New York City, and it offers a lot of amenities and features. I appreciate the time you spent with me today. Thank you for considering me as a potential tenant.

Please let me know if there are any further steps I need to take in order to finalize the rental agreement.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1300 Euros per month, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and I'm glad to have you as a potential tenant.

In order to finalize the rental agreement, please send me an email confirming your acceptance of the rental price and your willingness to sign a lease agreement. Once I receive your email, I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for review and signature.

Please note that the lease agreement will include certain terms and conditions that you will need to agree to, such as the length of the lease, the security deposit amount, and the rent payment schedule. I will be happy to answer any questions you may have about the lease agreement or the rental process in general.

Thank you again for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to working with you to finalize the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
